verses.verse: Then sang <S%H7891><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> this song <S%H7892><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and spake <S%H559><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, I will sing <S%H7891><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, for he hath triumphed <S%H1342><s%> gloriously <S%H1342><s%>: The horse <S%H5483><s%> and his rider <S%H7392><s%> hath he thrown <S%H7411><s%> into the sea <S%H3220><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3050><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and song <S%H2176><s%>, And he <S%H2088><s%> is become my salvation <S%H3444><s%>: This <S%H2088><s%> is my God <S%H410><s%>, and I will praise him <S%H1><s%>; My father's God <S%H430><s%>, and I will exalt him <S%H7311><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is a man <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is his name <S%H8034><s%>.

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s chariots <S%H4818><s%> and his host <S%H2428><s%> hath he cast <S%H3384><s%> into the sea <S%H3220><s%>; And his chosen <S%H4005><s%> captains <S%H7991><s%> are sunk <S%H2883><s%> in the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%>.
The deeps <S%H8415><s%> cover <S%H3680><s%> them <S%H3381><s%>: They went down into the depths <S%H4688><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> a stone <S%H68><s%>.

Thy right hand <S%H3225><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, is glorious <S%H142><s%> in power <S%H3581><s%>, Thy right hand <S%H3225><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, dasheth in pieces <S%H7492><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%>.

And in the greatness <S%H7230><s%> of thine excellency <S%H1347><s%> thou overthrowest <S%H2040><s%> them that rise up against <S%H6965><s%> thee <S%H7971><s%>: Thou sendest forth thy wrath <S%H2740><s%>, it consumeth <S%H398><s%> them as stubble <S%H7179><s%>.

And with the blast <S%H7307><s%> of thy nostrils <S%H639><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were piled <S%H6192><s%> up <S%H5140><s%>, The floods stood upright <S%H5324><s%> as a heap <S%H5067><s%>; The deeps <S%H8415><s%> were congealed <S%H7087><s%> in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>.

The enemy <S%H341><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, I will pursue <S%H7291><s%>, I will overtake <S%H5381><s%>, I will divide <S%H2505><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%>; My desire <S%H5315><s%> shall be satisfied <S%H4390><s%> upon them <S%H7324><s%>; I will draw my sword <S%H2719><s%>, my hand <S%H3027><s%> shall destroy them <S%H3423><s%>.

Thou didst blow <S%H5398><s%> with thy wind <S%H7307><s%>, the sea <S%H3220><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> them <S%H6749><s%>: They sank as lead <S%H5777><s%> in the mighty <S%H117><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>.

Who is like unto thee <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, among the gods <S%H410><s%>? Who is like thee <S%H142><s%>, glorious in holiness <S%H6944><s%>, Fearful <S%H3372><s%> in praises <S%H8416><s%>, doing <S%H6213><s%> wonders <S%H6382><s%>?
Thou stretchedst out <S%H5186><s%> thy right hand <S%H3225><s%>, The earth <S%H776><s%> swallowed them <S%H1104><s%>.

Thou in thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> hast led <S%H5148><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H2098><s%> thou hast redeemed <S%H1350><s%>: Thou hast guided <S%H5095><s%> them in thy strength <S%H5797><s%> to thy holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation <S%H5116><s%>.
The peoples <S%H5971><s%> have heard <S%H8085><s%>, they tremble <S%H7264><s%>: Pangs <S%H2427><s%> have taken hold <S%H270><s%> on the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Philistia <S%H6429><s%>.

Then <S%H227><s%> were the chiefs <S%H441><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%> dismayed <S%H926><s%>; The mighty men <S%H352><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, trembling <S%H7461><s%> taketh hold <S%H270><s%> upon them <S%H3427><s%>: All the inhabitants of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> are melted away <S%H4127><s%>.

Terror <S%H367><s%> and dread <S%H6343><s%> falleth <S%H5307><s%> upon them <S%H1419><s%>; By the greatness of thine arm <S%H2220><s%> they are as still <S%H1826><s%> as a stone <S%H68><s%>; Till thy people <S%H5971><s%> pass over <S%H5674><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Till the people <S%H5971><s%> pass over <S%H5674><s%> that <S%H2098><s%> thou hast purchased <S%H7069><s%>.

Thou wilt bring <S%H935><s%> them in <S%H5193><s%>, and plant them in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, The place <S%H4349><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, which thou hast made <S%H6466><s%> for thee to dwell in <S%H3427><s%>, The sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, O Lord <S%H136><s%>, which thy hands <S%H3027><s%> have established <S%H3559><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall reign <S%H4427><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5769><s%>.

For the horses <S%H5483><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> with his chariots <S%H7393><s%> and with his horsemen <S%H6571><s%> into the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> brought back <S%H7725><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> upon them <S%H1121><s%>; but the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> on dry <S%H3004><s%> land in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>.

And Miriam <S%H4813><s%> the prophetess <S%H5031><s%>, the sister <S%H269><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, took <S%H3947><s%> a timbrel <S%H8596><s%> in her hand <S%H3027><s%>; and all the women <S%H802><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> after <S%H310><s%> her with timbrels <S%H8596><s%> and with dances <S%H4246><s%>.

And Miriam <S%H4813><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> them <S%H7891><s%>, Sing ye to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, for he hath triumphed <S%H1342><s%> gloriously <S%H1342><s%>; The horse <S%H5483><s%> and his rider <S%H7392><s%> hath he thrown <S%H7411><s%> into the sea <S%H3220><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> led Israel <S%H3478><s%> onward <S%H5265><s%> from the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%>, and they went out <S%H3318><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Shur <S%H7793><s%>; and they went <S%H3212><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and found <S%H4672><s%> no water <S%H4325><s%>.

And when they came <S%H935><s%> to Marah <S%H4785><s%>, they could <S%H3201><s%> not drink <S%H8354><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Marah <S%H4785><s%>, for they were bitter <S%H4751><s%>: therefore the name <S%H8034><s%> of it was called <S%H7121><s%> Marah <S%H4785><s%>.
And the people <S%H5971><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, What shall we drink <S%H8354><s%>?

An he cried <S%H6817><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> showed <S%H3384><s%> him a tree <S%H6086><s%>, and he cast <S%H7993><s%> it into the waters <S%H4325><s%>, and the waters <S%H4325><s%> were made sweet <S%H4985><s%>. There he made <S%H7760><s%> for them a statute <S%H2706><s%> and an ordinance <S%H4941><s%>, and there he proved them <S%H5254><s%>;

and he said <S%H559><s%>, If thou wilt diligently <S%H8085><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, and wilt do <S%H6213><s%> that which is right <S%H3477><s%> in his eyes <S%H238><s%>, and wilt give ear to his commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> all his statutes <S%H2706><s%>, I will put <S%H7760><s%> none of the diseases <S%H4245><s%> upon thee <S%H7760><s%>, which I have put upon the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>: for I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> that healeth thee <S%H7495><s%>.

And they came <S%H935><s%> to Elim <S%H362><s%>, where were twelve <S%H8147><s%> springs <S%H5869><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>, and threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> palm-trees <S%H8558><s%>: and they encamped <S%H2583><s%> there by the waters <S%H4325><s%>.
